scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && cd apps/* && rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf ios && rm -rf android && yarn
scripts.build:dev:ios: cd apps/mobile && eas build --profile development -p ios
scripts.build:dev:android: cd apps/mobile && eas build --profile development -p android
scripts.build:staging:ios: cd apps/mobile && eas build --profile staging -p ios
scripts.build:staging:android: cd apps/mobile && eas build --profile staging -p android
scripts.build:beta:ios: cd apps/mobile && eas build --profile beta -p ios
scripts.build:beta:android: cd apps/mobile && eas build --profile beta -p android
scripts.build:prod:ios: cd apps/mobile && eas build --profile production -p ios
scripts.build:prod:android: cd apps/mobile && eas build --profile production -p android
scripts.ota:dev: cd apps/mobile && eas update --release-channel development --target managed
scripts.ota:staging: cd apps/mobile && eas update --release-channel staging --target managed
scripts.ota:beta: cd apps/mobile && eas update --release-channel beta --target managed
scripts.ota:prod: cd apps/mobile && eas update --release-channel production --target managed
